title: $20,000 penalty for ignoring compensation Order (FWO - Fair Work Ombudsman)
text: ( Source : FWO - Fair Work Ombudsman ) 8 October 2015 The Fair Work Ombudsman has again secured a penalty against a former Victorian petrol station operator , this time for ignoring an Order to pay compensation to an unfairly dismissed
